Annika:
Once upon a time, the best of the Dark Elves practiced magic here. Now only ruins remind of those times. But, despite the passage of centuries, every patch of land here is still saturated with dark magic. Feel the sinister aura that comes from the ruins?
Now I am training hard to become a Sentinel. As luck would have it, I was assigned to conduct reconnaissance here ... But I do not have the courage to go inside ...
